## OrganizationalItem type

Abstract base class for the data of "organizational items": items used to organize the items in a Repository.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type OrganizationalItem = RepositoryLocalObject & {
    AccessControlList?: AccessControlList;
    ContentSecurityDescriptor?: SecurityDescriptor;
    IsPermissionsInheritanceRoot?: boolean;
    IsRootOrganizationalItem?: boolean;
};
```

**References:** [RepositoryLocalObject](./open-api-client.repositorylocalobject.md)<!-- -->, [AccessControlList](./open-api-client.accesscontrollist.md)<!-- -->, [SecurityDescriptor](./open-api-client.securitydescriptor.md)
